```{r}
X   <- runif(20000, min=0, max=2.5)   # covariate
H   <- rbinom(20000,1,0.1)            # hypothesis true or false
Z   <- rnorm(20000, H*X)              # Z-score
pvalue <- 1-pnorm(Z)   
```

```{r}
test <- run_sim_no_ground_truth(pvalue, X)
```
